entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
